Articles.Content:
Cause this little device is incredibly light and strong, I'm using many of them on my crafts.

To reduce the number of parts, I suggest to create a long one as it exists with the Modular Girder Segment.

Thx for reading.
I like this idea. More struts is more good.

Might be even better without that typo in the title.

...

I'm sure it might be useful for building probes, but Kerbals are not those kind of aliens.

Removing "Octagonal" from the name of a part that is in no way octagonal would be nice, too. And while you're at it, change "strut" to "truss" in the name for consistency with all the other truss parts. Struts in KSP are completely different from trusses, including this particular part.
Sure, it's not a strut, and it's not octagonal. A real kerkal name indeed.
